name: Mongol NFT
description: MongolNFT Coin - a utility and governance token of MongolNFT platform. First of all MNFT is a utility token of MongolNFT.com (we are the owners, creators, and developers) platform. Secondly, MNFT is a governance token of our platform. Any features, additions, roadmap, etc. decided based on the DAO decision.
